channel.title: mattias on Samma.io
channel.description: Recent content in mattias on Samma.io

item.title: How a Scanner is working
item.description: How a scanner is working This will explain how a samma scanner is working. Start the scanner The first part of the scanner is a wrapper that starts the scan. These are on some scanner a python scripts that read the ENV values in the docker. And then wraps the scanner commands after these settings. this is one of the commands that start the Nmap scanner process = subprocess.Popen('sudo /bin/nmap -sV --script http-enum {0} -oX /out/result.

item.title: Why i built Samma
item.description: First page Why I started samma scanner. The scanners I worked with were far away from the developer. They were run on some external server and you could “Schedule a scan” that was started when there was space on the scanner server. I did see a problem with this a wanted scanners to be Light I wanted the scanner to be light runs fast and can be run anywhere from a scanner engine but also from a developer laptop.
